summary: Based on the true story of a black girl who was born to two white Afrikaner parents in South Africa during the apartheid era.
cast: Sophie Okonedo|Sam Neill|Alice Krige|Tony Kgoroge|Ella Ramangwane|Terri Ann Eckstein|Bongani Masondo|Dan Robbertse|Jeremy Crutchley|Jonathan Taylor|Nomathamsanga Baleka|Valesika Smith|Faniswa Yisa|Hannes Brummer|Zamanthebe Sithebe|Onida Cowan|Leana Truitsman|Lauren Das Neves|Jacques Gombault|Danny Keogh|Nicole Holme|Ben Botha|Duan Saayman|Zoea Alberts|Burger Nortje|Simon Mdohki|Elizabeth Serunye|Jonathan Pienaar|Tiaan Rautenbach|José Domingos|Nicole Regelous|Danie Struwig|Elriza Swanepoel|Stacey Sachs|Gordon van Rooyen|Morné Visser|Khalem Willet|Cobus Venter|Alan McBride|Tongayi Chirisa|Mpho Lekalakala|Hector Rabopaphe|Nomhle Nkonyeni|Graeme Bloch|Carel Trichardt|Gladys Mahlangu|Ivy Nkutha|Kholosa Tshandana|André Stolz|Drikus Volschenk|Ruaan Bok|Kate-Lyn Von Meyer|Tumi Morake|Matthew Lotter|Anna-Mart van der Merwe|Saint Seseli|Charmaine Kweyama|Nomkhosi Gidigidi|Thelma Siwela|Karien Van Der Merwe|Chan Marti|Charlotte Butler|Jakkie Groenewald|Lourens Groenewald|Steven Mofokeng|Fiona Ramsay|Malusi Skenjana
title: Skin
